name: To Stonks Or Not To Stonks
name_original: To Stonks Or Not To Stonks
description:
Currently the most accurate trading simulator i've ever played ! - IGN

In this game you will try to make money as a stonk market trader, buying and selling StonkCoins.

Controls : 

Buy Stonks to buy stonks

Sell stonks to sell stonks

Team :

Game design :

Maxime TARRET

Olivier SANTUCCI

Game programmer :

Alex DOUMENQ

Mathis ABDOU

Florent CAPRA

3D artist :

Théo SCORLETTI

2D artist :

Maxime TARRET

Sound design : 

Alex DOUMENQ
